entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Arviat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:28 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -36.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Arviat Airport 03:58 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Humidity: 65 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Blowing snow. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow this morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 51 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 35.
